nodes.text: As a flight attendant of 19+ years, we never had peanut allergies in the earlier days,
simris2k(339): As a flight attendant of 19+ years, we never had peanut allergies in the earlier days,
Annot: As a flight attendant of 19+ years, we never had peanut allergies in the earlier days,
people dealt with their own issues and got on with it.
simris2k(339): people dealt with their own issues and got on with it.
Annot: people dealt with their own issues and got on with it.
Where did all these peanutpeople come from?
simris2k(339): Where did all these peanutpeople come from?
Annot: Where did all these peanutpeople come from?
It seems like the latest "illness" fad that plagues this country far too often.
simris2k(339): It seems like the latest "illness" fad that plagues this country far too often.
Annot: It seems like the latest "illness" fad that plagues this country far too often.
BTW, no one has seemed to have died due to peanuts on Southwest,
simris2k(339): BTW, no one has seemed to have died due to peanuts on Southwest,
Annot: BTW, no one has seemed to have died due to peanuts on Southwest,
why does this have to be a Federal issue?
simris2k(339): why does this have to be a Federal issue?
Annot: why does this have to be a Federal issue?
My 9 year old daughter is one of the "peanut people" you mentioned in your post.
angelagarnett(345): My 9 year old daughter is one of the "peanut people" you mentioned in your post.
Annot: My 9 year old daughter is one of the "peanut people" you mentioned in your post.
While no one has seemed to have died due to peanuts on Southwest,
angelagarnett(345): While no one has seemed to have died due to peanuts on Southwest,
Annot: While no one has seemed to have died due to peanuts on Southwest,
the threat is there.
angelagarnett(345): the threat is there.
Annot: the threat is there.
I feel confident if you had a loved one with this life threatening allergy, you would feel differently.
angelagarnett(345): I feel confident if you had a loved one with this life threatening allergy, you would feel differently.
Annot: I feel confident if you had a loved one with this life threatening allergy, you would feel differently.
My daughter has been tested 4 times for her allergy to peanuts.
angelagarnett(345): My daughter has been tested 4 times for her allergy to peanuts.
Annot: My daughter has been tested 4 times for her allergy to peanuts.
She is in the highest category of reactivity
angelagarnett(345): She is in the highest category of reactivity
Annot: She is in the highest category of reactivity
which means if peanuts are being ingested in her vicnity, she could die.
angelagarnett(345): which means if peanuts are being ingested in her vicnity, she could die.
Annot: which means if peanuts are being ingested in her vicnity, she could die.
A buffer zone simply doesn't work in a cinfined space such as an airline.
angelagarnett(345): A buffer zone simply doesn't work in a cinfined space such as an airline.
Annot: A buffer zone simply doesn't work in a cinfined space such as an airline.
I have to treat her with Benadryl before any flights as a precaution.
angelagarnett(345): I have to treat her with Benadryl before any flights as a precaution.
Annot: I have to treat her with Benadryl before any flights as a precaution.
There are many more food and snack options that don't have the anaphylaxis potential to innocent human beings.
angelagarnett(345): There are many more food and snack options that don't have the anaphylaxis potential to innocent human beings.
Annot: There are many more food and snack options that don't have the anaphylaxis potential to innocent human beings.
I for one am ecstatic to hear about this initiative.
angelagarnett(345): I for one am ecstatic to hear about this initiative.
Annot: I for one am ecstatic to hear about this initiative.
It's becoming news for a good reason.
angelagarnett(345): It's becoming news for a good reason.
Annot: It's becoming news for a good reason.
People kids are dying from this
angelagarnett(345): People kids are dying from this
Annot: People kids are dying from this
and it can be 100% prevented.
angelagarnett(345): and it can be 100% prevented.
Annot: and it can be 100% prevented.
How was your child diagnosed with a peanut allergy?
Mulder(533): How was your child diagnosed with a peanut allergy?
Annot: How was your child diagnosed with a peanut allergy?
Did they eat penuts while under medical observation and have their blood tested for IgE antibodies?
Mulder(533): Did they eat penuts while under medical observation and have their blood tested for IgE antibodies?
Annot: Did they eat penuts while under medical observation and have their blood tested for IgE antibodies?
If not, then you don't know if they have an allergy, or even to what severity.
Mulder(533): If not, then you don't know if they have an allergy, or even to what severity.
Annot: If not, then you don't know if they have an allergy, or even to what severity.
As for your claim that she could die if peanuts are ingested in her vicinity, that is utterly false.
Mulder(533): As for your claim that she could die if peanuts are ingested in her vicinity, that is utterly false.
Annot: As for your claim that she could die if peanuts are ingested in her vicinity, that is utterly false.
The only way to have any reaction (including death) is to have contact with the offending allergen.
Mulder(533): The only way to have any reaction (including death) is to have contact with the offending allergen.
Annot: The only way to have any reaction (including death) is to have contact with the offending allergen.
So anyone else can eat all they like in her vicinity;
Mulder(533): So anyone else can eat all they like in her vicinity;
Annot: So anyone else can eat all they like in her vicinity;
she just has to not come in contact with it.
Mulder(533): she just has to not come in contact with it.
Annot: she just has to not come in contact with it.
Some people die from a severe reaction to peanuts,
Mulder(533): Some people die from a severe reaction to peanuts,
Annot: Some people die from a severe reaction to peanuts,
but not many,
Mulder(533): but not many,
Annot: but not many,
and I've yet to find a single instance of an airline passenger dying due to anaphylactic shock caused by peanuts.
Annot: and I've yet to find a single instance of an airline passenger dying due to anaphylactic shock caused by peanuts.
I utterly concur.
ricport(344): I utterly concur.
Annot: I utterly concur.
While I am sympathetic to those with this condition,
ricport(344): While I am sympathetic to those with this condition,
Annot: While I am sympathetic to those with this condition,
what will we ban next?
ricport(344): what will we ban next?
Annot: what will we ban next?
It is the TOTAL RESPONSIBILITY of the parent/adult to adequately prepare for the possibility of being exposed to an allergen.
ricport(344): It is the TOTAL RESPONSIBILITY of the parent/adult to adequately prepare for the possibility of being exposed to an allergen.
Annot: It is the TOTAL RESPONSIBILITY of the parent/adult to adequately prepare for the possibility of being exposed to an allergen.
What if other passengers brought peanuts onboard?
ricport(344): What if other passengers brought peanuts onboard?
Annot: What if other passengers brought peanuts onboard?
What do these people do when they are on a subway?
ricport(344): What do these people do when they are on a subway?
Annot: What do these people do when they are on a subway?
In a taxi?
ricport(344): In a taxi?
Annot: In a taxi?
At the mall food court?
ricport(344): At the mall food court?
Annot: At the mall food court?
In a restaurant?
ricport(344): In a restaurant?
Annot: In a restaurant?
Airlines have enough to worry about without all of these overthetop issues.
ricport(344): Airlines have enough to worry about without all of these overthetop issues.
Annot: Airlines have enough to worry about without all of these overthetop issues.
It's time for MORE PERSONAL RESPONSIBILITY and FAR LESS government nannying.
ricport(344): It's time for MORE PERSONAL RESPONSIBILITY and FAR LESS government nannying.
Annot: It's time for MORE PERSONAL RESPONSIBILITY and FAR LESS government nannying.
"total responsibility" is only possible when you have control.
dadwith4yearold(424): "total responsibility" is only possible when you have control.
Annot: "total responsibility" is only possible when you have control.
when you have both feet on the ground, you can drop everything and get to emergency services within 20 minutes.
dadwith4yearold(424): when you have both feet on the ground, you can drop everything and get to emergency services within 20 minutes.
Annot: when you have both feet on the ground, you can drop everything and get to emergency services within 20 minutes.
"Adequate preparation" = reducing possibility of exposure and carrying epipens just in case
dadwith4yearold(424): "Adequate preparation" = reducing possibility of exposure and carrying epipens just in case
Annot: "Adequate preparation" = reducing possibility of exposure and carrying epipens just in case
but they only buy you 20minutes or so
dadwith4yearold(424): but they only buy you 20minutes or so
Annot: but they only buy you 20minutes or so
and limit is 2 without medical supervision.
dadwith4yearold(424): and limit is 2 without medical supervision.
Annot: and limit is 2 without medical supervision.
so, smallminded pax eating peanuts at 30,000 feet and unsympathetic crew could = death.
dadwith4yearold(424): so, smallminded pax eating peanuts at 30,000 feet and unsympathetic crew could = death.
Annot: so, smallminded pax eating peanuts at 30,000 feet and unsympathetic crew could = death.
my experience is that government treats people according to the way they're acting.
dadwith4yearold(424): my experience is that government treats people according to the way they're acting.
Annot: my experience is that government treats people according to the way they're acting.
In the examples you give, a person can call 911 and get to a hospital within the 30 minute timeframe that 2 EpiPen doses buy you.
elizwestley(376): In the examples you give, a person can call 911 and get to a hospital within the 30 minute timeframe that 2 EpiPen doses buy you.
Annot: In the examples you give, a person can call 911 and get to a hospital within the 30 minute timeframe that 2 EpiPen doses buy you.
On a plane, especially one going overseas, that is not an option.
elizwestley(376): On a plane, especially one going overseas, that is not an option.
Annot: On a plane, especially one going overseas, that is not an option.
The 'peanut people' are not taking their business to Southwest.
whitney(337): The 'peanut people' are not taking their business to Southwest.
Annot: The 'peanut people' are not taking their business to Southwest.
Since your airline continues to serve peanuts,
whitney(337): Since your airline continues to serve peanuts,
Annot: Since your airline continues to serve peanuts,
people with severe allergies are flying with other airlines.
whitney(337): people with severe allergies are flying with other airlines.
Annot: people with severe allergies are flying with other airlines.
So I'm sure no one has died
whitney(337): So I'm sure no one has died
Annot: So I'm sure no one has died
because they can't fly on your planes.
whitney(337): because they can't fly on your planes.
Annot: because they can't fly on your planes.
Oh yeah, it's fad,
ambersky(302): Oh yeah, it's fad,
Annot: Oh yeah, it's fad,
everyone wants to be allergic to peanuts.
ambersky(302): everyone wants to be allergic to peanuts.
Annot: everyone wants to be allergic to peanuts.
I'm sorry
ambersky(302): I'm sorry
Annot: I'm sorry
but that was rude!
ambersky(302): but that was rude!
Annot: but that was rude!
I hope and pray you NEVER EVER have to deal with the anxiety of having a loved one DEATHLY allergic to peanuts (or anything).
ambersky(302): I hope and pray you NEVER EVER have to deal with the anxiety of having a loved one DEATHLY allergic to peanuts (or anything).
Annot: I hope and pray you NEVER EVER have to deal with the anxiety of having a loved one DEATHLY allergic to peanuts (or anything).
It is nerve racking day in and day out about the possibility of them going into anaphylatic shock.
ambersky(302): It is nerve racking day in and day out about the possibility of them going into anaphylatic shock.
Annot: It is nerve racking day in and day out about the possibility of them going into anaphylatic shock.
I think more education needs to be done
ambersky(302): I think more education needs to be done
Annot: I think more education needs to be done
so more people understand how bad these allergies have gotten
ambersky(302): so more people understand how bad these allergies have gotten
Annot: so more people understand how bad these allergies have gotten
and how much they have risen over the years.
ambersky(302): and how much they have risen over the years.
Annot: and how much they have risen over the years.
Maybe then you and others wouldn't say things like that!
ambersky(302): Maybe then you and others wouldn't say things like that!
Annot: Maybe then you and others wouldn't say things like that!
I think more education needs to be made, period, not just in flights.
ambersky(302): I think more education needs to be made, period, not just in flights.
Annot: I think more education needs to be made, period, not just in flights.
I have had people not understand why I ALWAYS have my son's epipen on me even when no signs of peanuts are seen.
ambersky(302): I have had people not understand why I ALWAYS have my son's epipen on me even when no signs of peanuts are seen.
Annot: I have had people not understand why I ALWAYS have my son's epipen on me even when no signs of peanuts are seen.
They don't understand the need to limit exposure best they can,
ambersky(302): They don't understand the need to limit exposure best they can,
Annot: They don't understand the need to limit exposure best they can,
and on a flight it'd be very difficult to limit it.
ambersky(302): and on a flight it'd be very difficult to limit it.
Annot: and on a flight it'd be very difficult to limit it.
I do think if complete bans aren't made an announcement would be a good start,
ambersky(302): I do think if complete bans aren't made an announcement would be a good start,
Annot: I do think if complete bans aren't made an announcement would be a good start,
but since education on the subject isn't well known,
ambersky(302): but since education on the subject isn't well known,
Annot: but since education on the subject isn't well known,
most passengers just wouldn't care.
ambersky(302): most passengers just wouldn't care.
Annot: most passengers just wouldn't care.
I think it's sad that people do not care that they are risking the life of someone,
ambersky(302): I think it's sad that people do not care that they are risking the life of someone,
Annot: I think it's sad that people do not care that they are risking the life of someone,

just so they can have a package of peanuts or peanut butter snack that they could wait til AFTER the flight to have, that won't kill them, but the peanuts could kill my child or someone deathly allergic.

ambersky(302): just so they can have a package of peanuts or peanut butter snack that they could wait til AFTER the flight to have, that won't kill them, but the peanuts could kill my child or someone deathly allergic.

Annot: just so they can have a package of peanuts or peanut butter snack that they could wait til AFTER the flight to have, that won't kill them, but the peanuts could kill my child or someone deathly allergic.
I once compared my son being around peanuts as to someone else eating their snack/lunch with rat poison on the tray/table.
ambersky(302): I once compared my son being around peanuts as to someone else eating their snack/lunch with rat poison on the tray/table.
Annot: I once compared my son being around peanuts as to someone else eating their snack/lunch with rat poison on the tray/table.
Would anyone want to eat or sit with poison right next to them?
ambersky(302): Would anyone want to eat or sit with poison right next to them?
Annot: Would anyone want to eat or sit with poison right next to them?
Well, peanuts are poison to people with allergies to them!
ambersky(302): Well, peanuts are poison to people with allergies to them!
Annot: Well, peanuts are poison to people with allergies to them!
The risk is always there regardless of a ban,
ambersky(302): The risk is always there regardless of a ban,
Annot: The risk is always there regardless of a ban,
but with a ban at least it might be less likely to happen.
ambersky(302): but with a ban at least it might be less likely to happen.
Annot: but with a ban at least it might be less likely to happen.
I just saw this video today
ambersky(302): I just saw this video today
Annot: I just saw this video today
and I think it helps explain the seriousness of these allergies.
ambersky(302): and I think it helps explain the seriousness of these allergies.
Annot: and I think it helps explain the seriousness of these allergies.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yriX3UwrCA
ambersky(302): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yriX3UwrCA

And what makes you think your kid is actually allergic?
howie(351): And what makes you think your kid is actually allergic?
Annot: And what makes you think your kid is actually allergic?
Did you read a news story about the one person in the history of the world who actually had said allergy and assume YOUR kid must be the other one?
howie(351): Did you read a news story about the one person in the history of the world who actually had said allergy and assume YOUR kid must be the other one?
Annot: Did you read a news story about the one person in the history of the world who actually had said allergy and assume YOUR kid must be the other one?
Munchasen by Proxy  look it up.
howie(351): Munchasen by Proxy  look it up.
Annot: Munchasen by Proxy  look it up.
The problem has increased over the years with the advent of more efficient turbofan engines.
JetJock(516): The problem has increased over the years with the advent of more efficient turbofan engines.
Annot: The problem has increased over the years with the advent of more efficient turbofan engines.
It was found that excessive bleed air extraction from the engines (fresh air) consumes more fuel than recirculating the air.
JetJock(516): It was found that excessive bleed air extraction from the engines (fresh air) consumes more fuel than recirculating the air.
Annot: It was found that excessive bleed air extraction from the engines (fresh air) consumes more fuel than recirculating the air.
Unlike the "coal burners" of the past, modern jets recirculate much more of the air.
JetJock(516): Unlike the "coal burners" of the past, modern jets recirculate much more of the air.
Annot: Unlike the "coal burners" of the past, modern jets recirculate much more of the air.
Yes, they go through filters
JetJock(516): Yes, they go through filters
Annot: Yes, they go through filters
but it is quite noticeable when those filters need to be changed,
JetJock(516): but it is quite noticeable when those filters need to be changed,
Annot: but it is quite noticeable when those filters need to be changed,
airflow decreases dramatically.
JetJock(516): airflow decreases dramatically.
Annot: airflow decreases dramatically.
With airlines scrambling to make money, non safety related items take a back seat
JetJock(516): With airlines scrambling to make money, non safety related items take a back seat
Annot: With airlines scrambling to make money, non safety related items take a back seat
and those expensive filters, I believe, are not changed as often.
JetJock(516): and those expensive filters, I believe, are not changed as often.
Annot: and those expensive filters, I believe, are not changed as often.
Also, your point about the number of people that died aboard a flight is only part of the question.
JetJock(516): Also, your point about the number of people that died aboard a flight is only part of the question.
Annot: Also, your point about the number of people that died aboard a flight is only part of the question.

One should ask how many people reached a critical stage during flight with anaphlaxis necessitating the use of epinephrine from the on board medical kit administered by a physician or nurse on a flight?

JetJock(516): One should ask how many people reached a critical stage during flight with anaphlaxis necessitating the use of epinephrine from the on board medical kit administered by a physician or nurse on a flight?

Annot: One should ask how many people reached a critical stage during flight with anaphlaxis necessitating the use of epinephrine from the on board medical kit administered by a physician or nurse on a flight?
In other words, how many times was it necessary to intervene or risk the death of a passenger?
JetJock(516): In other words, how many times was it necessary to intervene or risk the death of a passenger?
Annot: In other words, how many times was it necessary to intervene or risk the death of a passenger?
Airport Crash Fire and Rescue facilities would be a valuable asset for those statistics
JetJock(516): Airport Crash Fire and Rescue facilities would be a valuable asset for those statistics
Annot: Airport Crash Fire and Rescue facilities would be a valuable asset for those statistics
as they are the ones to meet a flight if a passenger was ill.
JetJock(516): as they are the ones to meet a flight if a passenger was ill.
Annot: as they are the ones to meet a flight if a passenger was ill.
You got that right!
howie(351): You got that right!
Annot: You got that right!
The whole antipeanut movement is the result of hyperparanoid parents imagining worst case scenarios

Annot: The whole antipeanut movement is the result of hyperparanoid parents imagining worst case scenarios
and thinking that they have the one child in a billion who actually has a problem with the supposed allergen.

Annot: and thinking that they have the one child in a billion who actually has a problem with the supposed allergen.
The only way peanuts are going to hurt you is if you choke on them.
